definition: abbr. for 國際足球聯合會|国际足球联合会, FIFA, international federation of football associations
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: This is turning into a huge disaster for FIFA and the South African organisers.
sentences.chinese: 这将给国际足联和南非的组织者带来一场巨大的灾难。

sentences.english: This goes against what was previously a strong anti-technology stance from FIFA.
sentences.chinese: 这和国际足联之前强烈反对科技介入的姿态正好相反。

sentences.english: Soccer’s best nations convene in South Africa for the month-long FIFA World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 足球强国聚集南非参加为期一个月的国际足联世界杯。

sentences.english: The examination is organised by the association and held under thegeneral supervision of FIFA.
sentences.chinese: 考试由协会组织，接受国际足联的监督。

sentences.english: Only FIFA has access to this bankguarantee.
sentences.chinese: 只有国际足联才有权取得该银行保函。

sentences.english: I was so disappointed with the referee, he should get punished by FIFA.
sentences.chinese: 我对那个裁判太失望了，他应该受到国际足联的处罚。

sentences.english: That same year saw Matthäus granted the firstever FIFA World Player of the Year award.
sentences.chinese: 同年，马特乌斯获得了国际足联第一届最佳球员奖。

sentences.english: The part of the examination referred toin the previous paragraph must be carried out by using the questionnairesupplied by FIFA.
sentences.chinese: 上述内容的考试须使用国际足联提供的问卷。

sentences.english: President Barack Obama stated, with unilateralist insouciance, that FIFA had made the wrong choice.
sentences.chinese: 美国总统奥巴马宣称，国际足联做了一个错误的决定。

sentences.english: Can he turn FIFA into a bookie's shop?
sentences.chinese: 他能把国际足联变成家彩票店吗？

sentences.english: The FIFA Women's World Ranking will be used to decide the other seeds.
sentences.chinese: 国际足联女足国家队排名会用以确定其他种子队。

sentences.english: FIFA says bin Hammam and Warner will now face a full FIFA inquiry.
sentences.chinese: 国际足联称哈曼和华纳如今将面临全面调查。

sentences.english: FIFA reserves the right to execute spot checks atthe associations with regard to the examination procedure.
sentences.chinese: 国际足联保留抽查各协会考试程序的权利。

sentences.english: FIFA are expected to make an announcement about the issue on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 国际足联将在本周二就这一问题发表一个通告。

definition: Asian Football Confederation/abbr. for 亞洲足球聯合會|亚洲足球联合会[Ya4 zhou1 Zu2 qiu2 Lian2 he2 hui4]
soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
Olympic organizing committee/abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會組織委員會|奥林匹克运动会组织委员会
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF)/abbr. for 國際田徑聯合會|国际田径联合会[Guo2 ji4 Tian2 jing4 Lian2 he2 hui4]
